Dialog.Topics: Credit and credibility: France and the UK

Have you even looked at French vs UK debt auction schedules? You are effectively saying that it is impossible for the UK govt to have gained some credibility yet simultaneously for the French situation to have worsened, the basis of you're claim or argument being that because the French could NOT have earned confidence (presumaby it is too soon since their election) then the reason for there rates moving down MUST be the same as the reason that UK rates have moved down. Why should it be the same? And would you reverse your position if French rates move higher?
